text: Larry LaBruce Koon (February 18, 1944 â€“ October 15, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the South Carolina House of Representatives as a member of the Republican Party from 1975 to 2004. In 2004, he lost in a Republican primary runoff against Nikki Haley. He was born in Leesville, South Carolina. Koon died on October 15, 2021 in Lexington, South Carolina at the age of 77.Larry LaBruce Koon Obituary ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Larry Koon (politician)
